turns.content: Write a song about fat delicious bagels in the style of an operea

Verse 1:
In the bakery, oh so early
Rise the dough, in perfect form
Round and plump, so very tempting
Golden brown, they're quickly warming

Chorus:
Fat delicious bagels, oh how we adore
Sesame seeds, poppy seeds, and all the more
Spread with cream cheese, or topped with lox
Our favorite breakfast, in a bagel box

Verse 2:
The aroma fills the morning air
As we bite into the soft, fluffy bread
Savoring the flavors, oh so fair
Our love for bagels, will never be dead

Chorus:
Fat delicious bagels, oh how we adore
Sesame seeds, poppy seeds, and all the more
Spread with cream cheese, or topped with lox
Our favorite breakfast, in a bagel box

Bridge:
From the bagel shop, to the café
These tasty treats, bring us joy each day
Whether toasted, or fresh from the oven
Fat delicious bagels, we'll never tire of them

Chorus:
Fat delicious bagels, oh how we adore
Sesame seeds, poppy seeds, and all the more
Spread with cream cheese, or topped with lox
Our favorite breakfast, in a bagel box.
